description: Try our easy to follow Meaty Lovers Toastie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,Low sugar,Christmas leftovers,Beef,Ham,High protein,High fibre,Comfort food,Quick & easy lunch,Turkey,Leftovers
name: Meaty Lovers Toastie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small onion, sliced into thin rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a medium frying pan over medium-low heat.
Layer one slice of untoasted bread with halved quantities of mustard, onion, ham, turkey, beef, Swiss cheese and rocket. Season to taste.
Top with toasted slice of rye and repeat with remaining ingredients, finishing with remaining slice of bread on top, ensuring the toasted bread is in the middle.
Spread a thin layer of butter over the top slice of bread. Cook sandwich in frying pan, buttered side-down, for 2 minutes or until golden.
Carefully flip sandwich and spread other side with butter. Cook for a further 2 minutes or until golden.
Transfer toastie to a plate, cut in half and skewer with baby pickles to serve.
